item.title: Senior QA / Test Engineer - Bilingual English / Spanish (financial district)
item.description:
Senior QA Engineering role, for bilingual English / Spanish speaker, with international Investment Management organisation. Role involves System and Integration Testing on a data warehousing project within a financial services environment. Platform Technology cover ETL, SQL, RDBMS, JAVA, UNIX, XML etc.

As a Senior Quality Assurance Engineer you will identify the test environment, identify acceptance criteria, plan and design tests, configure the test environment, implement the test design, execute the test and analyze results, produce reports and retest. Testing will cover Integration, Performance, Functional, Regression and Smoke Testing.

The ideal candidate will have significant experience designing and executing QA / Testing assignments in complex database environments, specifically within financial services. You will need to demonstrate specific experience working on data warehousing and / or database migration projects. You will be comfortable creating complex test plans and scenarios and able to set up detailed test environments using automated QA tools. Expertise with JUnit and / or JTest will be advantageous. You will be highly competent working with SQL for Oracle or Sybase and be able to perform data integrity and data point validation according to DB schemas.

MorningGroup is a specialist IT Consultancy that provides software development solutions to Investment Management firms in San Francisco and overseas. This is a great opportunity to work for our premier client on a high profile development project.
item.dc:title: Senior QA / Test Engineer - Bilingual English / Spanish (financial district)
